ECS272 Homework 3

Yuhan Huang

Visualization 1: Stream Diiagram shows the relative magnitude of published songs each year from 1960 for top 10 artists who have the most number of songs released since 1970; Hover the mouse to highlight and see the name of the author. Visualization 2: Spider chart illustrating different metrics for the 10 most popular song on Spotify since 1920; hover the cursor on data to highlight and see detailed information. Drag the polygons on the top away to check those records covered below. Visualization 3: An overview time series of scatter plots of song metrics; use the dropdown list to select the metric. Brush to draw a rectangle and the visualization will zoom in to the selected region.
